name: Emoji Games: Christmas
description:
Help Santa Claus to push gifts to the "X" locations to solve the puzzle.
This game is a push maze puzzle, an implementation of the classic puzzle game Sokoban.

Features:

- Free
- 400 levels
- Different difficulties and sizes, from very easy to very hard
- Clean interface
- Designed for tablets and phones
- Unlimited undo


Emoji icons supplied by EmojiOne: https://www.emojione.com/
